author: Pander8874

text: Such beauty... I remember playing this when I was 7 years old and how driven I was to get revenge for the death of  Ryo's father. Before playing the Shenmue games, I never cared for games that are all about the story. I played cheap super-hero games and loved them. After playing Shenmue and the Metal Gear Solid games, I realized that the most important thing a game needs is an amazing story that drives the player to play more and more. This game changed my life forever and I'll never forget it.
